name: Bull's Strength
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook. © 2009, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M/DF (a few hairs, or a pinch of dung, from a bull)
text: The subject becomes stronger. The spell grants a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength, adding the usual benefits to melee attack rolls, melee damage rolls, and other uses of the Strength modifier.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料/法器 (公牛的毛发或粪便)
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 受术者变得更加强壮。该法术会使受术者的力量获得+4的增强加值，从而会给近战攻击检定、近战伤害检定以及其他使用力量修正的方面带来通常的好处。
